SELECT aa.* FROM ( SELECT l.inqbSeq, l.inqbType, l.inqbTitle, l.inqbContent, l.inqbReContent, l.inqbCompleteNy, l.inqbRegDate, l.inqbEdiDate, l.inqbDelNy, l.inMember_inmeSeq, l.inStaff_instSeq, l.inQnaBoard_inqbSeq, c.inmeSeq, c.inmeId, d.instSeq, d.instId
ORDER BY (case when inQnaBoard_inqbSeq = 0 then inqbSeq else inQnaBoard_inqbSeq end), inqbRegDate ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT l.inqbSeq, l.inqbType, l.inqbTitle, l.inqbContent, l.inqbReContent, l.inqbCompleteNy, l.inqbRegDate, l.inqbEdiDate, l.inqbDelNy, l.inMember_inmeSeq, l.inStaff_instSeq, l.inQnaBoard_inqbSeq, c.inmeSeq, c.inmeId, d.instSeq, d.instId FROM mini.inqnaboard AS l LEFT JOIN inmember AS c on c.inmeSeq = l.inMember_inmeSeq LEFT JOIN inStaff AS d on d.instSeq = l.inStaff_instSeq WHERE 1=1 AND l.inqbSeq = #{inqbSeq}

SELECT last_insert_id()
mapper.update: UPDATE inqnaboard SET inqbDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND inqbSeq = #{inqbSeq}
